Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its significance, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the potential it holds for enhancing your endeavors or personal collection. I trust this offer will resonate with your interest and value for the product. Should you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
